sentences.sContent: It leaves indelible stains on clothes.
sentences.sCn: 它会在衣物上留下洗不掉的污渍。

sentences.sContent: The message was written in indelible ink.
sentences.sCn: 这条信息是用不褪色的墨水写的。

remMethod.val: in(不) + de(消失) + li(=liv 石灰) + ble → 用石灰无法去掉的 → 擦拭不掉的

trans.tranCn: 去不掉的, 不能拭除的
trans.tranOther: Indelible ink or an indelible stain cannot be removed or washed out
